data.title: NIST 800-171 Section 3.1: Access Control
data.phrase: datamodel | filter xdm.auth.privilege_level contains "" | fields xdm.auth.* | limit 500

data.title: NIST 800-171 Section 3.3: Audit and Accountability
data.phrase: datamodel | filter xdm.event.type contains "" | filter xdm.source.host.hostname = "Ivar"

data.title: NIST 800-171 Section 3.4: Configuration Management
data.phrase: datamodel | filter xdm.observer.content_version contains "" | fields xdm.source.host.hostname, xdm.source.agent.identifier, xdm.observer.content_version

data.title: NIST 800-171 Section 3.5: Identification and Authentication
data.phrase: datamodel | filter xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.encryption_type contains "AES" | fields xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.encryption_type , xdm.source.host.hostname, xdm.source.ipv4, xdm.source.user.username, xdm.source.port, xdm.target.host.hostname, xdm.target.ipv4, xdm.target.user.username | limit 500

data.title: NIST 800-171 Section 3.6: Incident Response
data.phrase: datamodel | filter xdm.observer.product contains "Cortex" | fields xdm.observer.*

data.title: NIST 800-171 Section 3.7: Maintenance
data.phrase: datamodel | filter xdm.observer.content_version contains "" | fields xdm.source.host.hostname, xdm.source.agent.identifier, xdm.observer.content_version

data.title: NIST 800-171 Section 3.8: Media Protection
data.phrase: datamodel | filter xdm.observer.vendor contains "PANW" | fields xdm.observer.* | limit 500

data.title: NIST 800-171 Section 3.9: Personnel Security
data.phrase: datamodel | fields xdm.source.user.first_name, xdm.source.user.last_name, xdm.source.user.middle_name, xdm.source.user.employee_id, xdm.source.user.badge_id

data.title: NIST 800-171 Section 3.10: Physical Protection
data.phrase: datamodel | fields xdm.source.user.first_name, xdm.source.user.last_name, xdm.source.user.middle_name, xdm.source.user.employee_id, xdm.source.user.badge_id

data.title: NIST 800-171 Section 3.11: Risk Assessment
data.phrase: datamodel | filter xdm.observer.content_version contains "" | fields xdm.source.host.hostname, xdm.source.agent.identifier, xdm.observer.content_version

data.title: NIST 800-171 Section 3.12: Security Assessment
data.phrase: datamodel | filter xdm.observer.content_version contains "" | fields xdm.source.host.hostname, xdm.source.agent.identifier, xdm.observer.content_version

data.title: NIST 800-171 Section 3.13: Systems and Communications Protection
data.phrase: datamodel | filter xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.encryption_type contains "AES" | fields xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.encryption_type , xdm.source.host.hostname, xdm.source.ipv4, xdm.source.user.username, xdm.source.port, xdm.target.host.hostname, xdm.target.ipv4, xdm.target.user.username | limit 500

data.title: NIST 800-171 Section 3.14: System and Information Integrity
data.phrase: datamodel | filter xdm.observer.product contains "Cortex" | fields xdm.observer.*
